title: july 6: gotta catch ‘em all!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the release of Pokémon Go. After, she reflects on the Dalai Lama’s record. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
